Class SplunkRestInput

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class SplunkRestInput
extends SplunkInput
    Common REST logic shared by all appenders/handlers
    Author:
    Damien Dallimore damien@baboonbones.com

        Create a SplunkRestInput object to send events to Splunk via REST endpoints
        Parameters:
        user - Splunk user
        pass - Splunk user pass
        host - REST endppoint host
        port - REST endpoint port
        red - url parameter values
        stream - true=stream , false=do not stream (be aware, poor performance)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
